128/**
129 *  The categories for the SVG elements.
130 *
131 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
132 *  @version $Id: SVGElementCategory.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
133 *  @since 0.0.5
134 *
135 *  @UMLGraph.link
136 */
137@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGElementCategory.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
138@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
139public enum SVGElementCategory
140{
141        /*------------------*\
142    ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
143        \*------------------*/
144    /**
145     *  Animation element.
146     */
147    ANIMATION( "Animation Element", SVGELEMENT_Animate,
148            SVGELEMENT_AnimateColor, SVGELEMENT_AnimateMotion,
149            SVGELEMENT_AnimateTransform, SVGELEMENT_Discard,
150            SVGELEMENT_MPath, SVGELEMENT_Set ),
151
152    /**
153     *  Basic shape element.
154     */
155    BASIC_SHAPE( "Basic Shape", SVGELEMENT_Circle, SVGELEMENT_Ellipse,
156            SVGELEMENT_Line, SVGELEMENT_Polygon, SVGELEMENT_PolyLine,
157            SVGELEMENT_Rectangle ),
158
159    /**
160     *  Animation element.
161     */
162    CONTAINER( "Container Element", SVGELEMENT_Anchor, SVGELEMENT_Defs,
163            SVGELEMENT_Group, SVGELEMENT_Marker, SVGELEMENT_Mask,
164            SVGELEMENT_MissingGlyph, SVGELEMENT_Pattern, SVGELEMENT_Root,
165            SVGELEMENT_Switch, SVGELEMENT_Symbol, SVGELEMENT_Unknown ),
166
167    /**
168     *  Descriptive element.
169     */
170    DESCRIPTIVE( "Descriptive Element", SVGELEMENT_Description,
171            SVGELEMENT_Metadata, SVGELEMENT_Title ),
172
173    /**
174     *  Filter primitive element.
175     */
176    FILTER_PRIMITIVE( "Filter Primitive Element", SVGELEMENT_Ellipse,
177            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feBlend, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feColorMatrix,
178            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feComponentTransfer,
179            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feComposite, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feConvolveMatrix,
180            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feDiffuseLighting,
181            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feDisplacementMap,
182            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feDropShadow, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feFlood,
183            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feFuncA, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feFuncB,
184            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feFuncG, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feFuncR,
185            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feGaussianBlur, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feImage,
186            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feMerge, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feMergeNode,
187            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feMorphology, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feOffset,
188            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feSpecularLighting, SVGELEMENT_Filter_feTile,
189            SVGELEMENT_Filter_feTurbulence ),
190
191    /**
192     *  Font element.
193     */
194    FONT( "Font Element", SVGELEMENT_Font, SVGELEMENT_FontFace,
195            SVGELEMENT_FontFaceFormat, SVGELEMENT_FontFaceName,
196            SVGELEMENT_FontFaceSource, SVGELEMENT_FontFaceURI,
197            SVGELEMENT_HKern, SVGELEMENT_VKern ),
198
199    /**
200     *  Gradient element.
201     */
202    GRADIENT( "Gradient Element", SVGELEMENT_GradientLinear,
203            SVGELEMENT_GradientMesh, SVGELEMENT_GradientRadial,
204            SVGELEMENT_Stop ),
205
206    /**
207     *  Graphics element.
208     */
209    GRAPHICS( "Graphics Element", SVGELEMENT_Circle, SVGELEMENT_Ellipse,
210            SVGELEMENT_Image, SVGELEMENT_Line, SVGELEMENT_Mesh,
211            SVGELEMENT_Path, SVGELEMENT_Polygon, SVGELEMENT_PolyLine,
212            SVGELEMENT_Rectangle, SVGELEMENT_Text, SVGELEMENT_Use ),
213
214    /**
215     *  Graphics referencing element.
216     */
217    GRAPHICS_REFERENCE( "Graphics Referencing Element", SVGELEMENT_Mesh,
218            SVGELEMENT_Use ),
219
220    /**
221     *  Light source element.
222     */
223    LIGHT_SOURCE( "Light Source Element", SVGELEMENT_Light_feDistantLight,
224            SVGELEMENT_Light_fePointLight, SVGELEMENT_Light_feSpotLight ),
225
226    /**
227     *  Never-rendered element.
228     */
229    NEVER_RENDERED( "Never-Rendered Element", SVGELEMENT_ClipPath,
230            SVGELEMENT_Defs, SVGELEMENT_Description, SVGELEMENT_GradientLinear,
231            SVGELEMENT_GradientMesh, SVGELEMENT_GradientRadial,
232            SVGELEMENT_Hatch, SVGELEMENT_Marker, SVGELEMENT_Mask,
233            SVGELEMENT_Metadata, SVGELEMENT_Pattern, SVGELEMENT_Script,
234            SVGELEMENT_Style, SVGELEMENT_Symbol, SVGELEMENT_Title ),
235
236    /**
237     *  Paint server element.
238     */
239    PAINT_SERVER( "Paint Server Element", SVGELEMENT_GradientLinear,
240            SVGELEMENT_GradientMesh, SVGELEMENT_GradientRadial,
241            SVGELEMENT_Hatch, SVGELEMENT_Pattern, SVGELEMENT_SolidColor ),
242
243    /**
244     *  Renderable element.
245     */
246    RENDERABLE( "Renderable Element", SVGELEMENT_Anchor, SVGELEMENT_Circle,
247            SVGELEMENT_Ellipse, SVGELEMENT_ForeignObject, SVGELEMENT_Group,
248            SVGELEMENT_Image, SVGELEMENT_Line, SVGELEMENT_Mesh,
249            SVGELEMENT_Path, SVGELEMENT_Polygon, SVGELEMENT_PolyLine,
250            SVGELEMENT_Rectangle, SVGELEMENT_Root, SVGELEMENT_Switch,
251            SVGELEMENT_Symbol, SVGELEMENT_Text, SVGELEMENT_TextPath,
252            SVGELEMENT_TSpan, SVGELEMENT_Unknown, SVGELEMENT_Use ),
253
254    /**
255     *  Shape element.
256     */
257    SHAPE( "Shape Element", SVGELEMENT_Circle, SVGELEMENT_Ellipse,
258            SVGELEMENT_Line, SVGELEMENT_Mesh, SVGELEMENT_Path,
259            SVGELEMENT_Polygon, SVGELEMENT_PolyLine, SVGELEMENT_Rectangle ),
260
261    /**
262     *  Structural element.
263     */
264    STRUCTURAL( "Structural Element", SVGELEMENT_Defs, SVGELEMENT_Group,
265            SVGELEMENT_Root, SVGELEMENT_Symbol, SVGELEMENT_Use ),
266
267    /**
268     *  Text content element.
269     */
270    TEXT_CONTENT( "Text Content Element", SVGELEMENT_AltGlyph,
271            SVGELEMENT_AltGlyphDef, SVGELEMENT_AltGlyphItem, SVGELEMENT_Glyph,
272            SVGELEMENT_GlyphRef, SVGELEMENT_TextPath, SVGELEMENT_TRef,
273            SVGELEMENT_TSpan ),
274
275    /**
276     *  Text content child element.
277     */
278    TEXT_CONTENT_CHILD( "Text Content Child Element", SVGELEMENT_AltGlyph,
279            SVGELEMENT_TextPath, SVGELEMENT_TRef, SVGELEMENT_TSpan ),
280
281    /**
282     *  Text content element.
283     */
284    UNCATEGORIZED( "Uncategorised Element", SVGELEMENT_ClipPath,
285            SVGELEMENT_ColorProfile, SVGELEMENT_Cursor, SVGELEMENT_Filter,
286            SVGELEMENT_ForeignObject, SVGELEMENT_HatchPath,
287            SVGELEMENT_MeshPatch, SVGELEMENT_MeshRow, SVGELEMENT_Script,
288            SVGELEMENT_Style, SVGELEMENT_View );
289
290        /*------------*\
291    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
292        \*------------*/
293    /**
294     *  The element categories by element names.
295     */
296    private static final LazyMap<String,Set<SVGElementCategory>> m_CategoriesByElement = LazyMap.use( true, () ->
297        stream( values() ).
298            flatMap( v ->
299            {
300                final var map = v.getElements()
301                    .stream()
302                    .collect( toMap( identity(), e -> v, ( a, b ) -> b, HashMap::new ) );
303                return map.entrySet().stream();
304            } ).
305            collect(
306                toUnmodifiableMap( Map.Entry::getKey,
307                    e -> EnumSet.of( e.getValue() ),
308                    (final Set<SVGElementCategory> s1, final Set<SVGElementCategory> s2) ->
309                    {
310                        s1.addAll( s2 );
311                        return s1;
312                    }
313                )
314            )
315    );
316
317    /**
318     *  The category description.
319     */
320    private final String m_Description;
321
322    /**
323     *  The elements that belong to this category.
324     */
325    private final Set<String> m_ElementNames;
326
327        /*--------------*\
328    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
329        \*--------------*/
330    /**
331     *  Creates a new {@code SVGElementCategory} instance.
332     *
333     *  @param  description The description.
334     *  @param  elementNames    The names of the elements that belongs to this
335     *      category.
336     */
337    private SVGElementCategory( final String description, final String... elementNames )
338    {
339        m_Description = description;
340        m_ElementNames = Set.of( elementNames );
341    }   //  SVGElementCategory()
342
343        /*---------*\
344    ====** Methods **==========================================================
345        \*---------*/
346    /**
347     *  Returns the names of the elements that belong to this category.
348     *
349     *  @return The element names.
350     */
351    public final Collection<String> getElements() { return m_ElementNames; }
352
353    /**
354     *  Retrieves the element category for the given element name.
355     *
356     *  @param  elementName The name of the element.
357     *  @return The categories for this element; will never be {@code null}.
358     */
359    public static final Collection<SVGElementCategory> retrieveElementCategory( final String elementName )
360    {
361        final var retValue = m_CategoriesByElement.getOrDefault( requireNotEmptyArgument( elementName, "elementName" ), emptySet() );
362
363        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
364        return retValue;
365    }   //  retrieveElementCategory()
366
367    /**
368     *  {@inheritDoc}
369     */
370    @Override
371    public final String toString() { return m_Description; }
372}
373//  class SVGElementCategory
374
375/*
376 *  End of File
377 */
